All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.imageio.spi.RegisterableService
public class MPOImageReaderSpi
extends javax.imageio.spi.ImageReaderSpi

ImageIO service provider interface for images in the MultiPicture Object format (MPO).

See: MPO Format Specification.

Version:
1.0 2010-01-05 Created.

Werner Randelshofer
